page.title: 06CLUBS
page.content: People go to lots of different clubs, here are two clubs that people have written about: {The Girl Guides. The Girl Guides meet on a Monday.The uniform we wear is a blue shirt, a blue skirt and a red scarf. Other companies have different coloured scarves. A guide company has a captain or a guider who takes charge, the captain or guider also has two or three assistants.The Girl Guides started in 1910 and has been going for 75 years. {Youth Club.} The Grange Youth Club is held twice a week, on Mondays and Fridays. People play darts, snooker and table-tennis on Mondays and have a disco on a Friday. There is a tuck shop which sells soft drinks. Starting time is 8p.m. and finishing time is 10p.m.
